bioghist.p: Susan Orr Braudy graduated from Bryn Mawr College in 1963. She is the author of Family Circle: the Boudins and the Aristocracy of the Left. Kathy Boudin (b. 1943) graduated from Bryn Mawr College in 1962 and is the daughter of attorney Leonard Boudin who represented such controversial clients as Judith Coplon, Fidel Castro, and Paul Robeson. Kathy Boudin was convicted in 1984 of felony murder for her involvement in a Brinks armored car robbery, and the associated killings of three people.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of materials gathered by Braudy for her book on the Boudin family. Materials include FBI files, clippings, court transcripts, police radio transcripts, and photocopies of articles. FBI files include those of Leonard Boudin, Tyrone Rison, the Weathermen, Ted Gold, and Victor Rabinowitz.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
